# ---------------------------
# Eclipse Specific Files
# ---------------------------
.classpath
.project
.settings/

# ---------------------------
# Build Output
# ---------------------------
/bin/
/build/
/target/
/out/

# ---------------------------
# Logs and Temp Files
# ---------------------------
*.log
*.tmp
*.bak
*.swp

# ---------------------------
# OS Generated Files
# ---------------------------
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# ---------------------------
# Java Compiled Files
# ---------------------------
*.class

# ---------------------------
# Configuration & Secrets
# ---------------------------
# Hibernate or Database config files
hibernate.cfg.xml
application.properties
application.yml
config.properties

# ---------------------------
# Environment Files
# ---------------------------
.env
